Name: Southern Mule
Ingredients: 60 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice filled glass. TOP with ginger beer, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Tangy, fruity and spiced with ginger.
History: A detailed history of the Moscow Mule cocktail , of which this drink is a variant, can be found on our page.
Nutrition: One serving of Southern Mule contains 151 calories
